channel.title: Flyakite 3.5~~~~~ Mac OS X Transformation Pack
channel.description:
Flyakite OSX is a transformation pack. It will transform the look of an ordinary Windows XP+ system to resemble the look of Mac OS X. The installer automates the process of replacing system files, applying registry tweaks, installing 3rd party software, skins, and extras such as cursors, sounds, visual styles, etc.
I personally use this and I think its great. Easy to install and uninstall. Looks good.
[url=http://osx.portraitofakite.com/]http://osx.portraitofakite.com/[/url]
~Screenshot of my Desktop~

item.title: Flyakite 3.5~~~~~ Mac OS X Transformation Pack
item.dc:creator: @time_mage2 time---mage2
item.description:
@time_mage2 wrote:

dont think its a virus because i used to a year when i was a n00b to my XPS but luckily for me i had made a restore point just before i installed, this program changes windows files, so to get it to fully install you need to insert disk again and re-install windows :mad: spent 3 weeks looking non-stop for disk

Read full topic
